questions.prompt: What special prop should always be included for lists of elements?
answers: id
name
key
prop

questions.prompt: A React component is a function that returns ______.
answers: HTML
JSX
props
state

questions.prompt: Which event handler will run when a user is finished filling out a form?
answers: onSubmit
onClick
onChange
onForm

questions.prompt: ______ is a tool that transpiles JSX into valid JavaScript.
answers: React
Babel
Webpack
ES6

questions.prompt: What syntax makes it possible to unpack values from arrays, or properties from objects, into distinct variables?
answers: spread
key-value
coalescing
destructuring

questions.prompt: Returning different elements from a component depending on the state of your application is known as _____ rendering.
answers: voodoo
conditional
reactive
controlled

questions.prompt: What are some key features of Next.js?
What are some key features of Next.js?
What are some key features of Next.js?
What are some key features of Next.js?
What are some key features of Next.js?
ezaeza
What are some key features of Next.js?
answers: Server-side rendering (SSR) for faster page loads and improved SEO.
Automatic code splitting for efficient loading of JavaScript bundles.
API routes for building serverless functions and handling backend logic.
Built-in support for CSS modules and styled components for easy styling of components.
